column6: The person who created the demographics file. Files generated by |COMPS_s| will include this value, but it is not used by |EMOD_s| simulations.
The date the demographics file was created. Files generated by |COMPS_s| will include this value, but it is not used by |EMOD_s| simulations.

The identifier for a simulation; all input files (except configuration and campaign files) used in a simulation must have the same **IdReference** value. The value must be greater than 0. If the input files are generated using |COMPS_s|, this indicates the method used for generating the **NodeID**, the identifier used for each node in the simulation.
The structure that contains the metadata for the demographics file.
The number of nodes to expect in the input files. This parameter is required.
The spatial resolution of the demographics file. Files generated by |COMPS_s| will include this value, but it is not used by |EMOD_s| simulations.
The software tool used to create the demographics file. Files generated by |COMPS_s| will include this value, but it is not used by |EMOD_s| simulations.
